step1.para: If previously removed, install the O-ring in the bore of the range cylinder housing ( Figure 281).

figure.caption: Figure 280. Install O-Ring in Bore of Range Cylinder Housing

step1.para: Position the new gasket on housing mounting surface and install the cylinder housing in the rear bore of the auxiliary housing, air fitting to the upper left ( Figure 282). Apply Loctite 242 to the bolt threads and tighten to 35 to 45 ft-lbs. (47 to 61 Nm) to secure the cylinder housing to the auxiliary housing.

Place the range yoke into position with the sliding clutch of the synchronizer assembly, long hub of yoke to the front (RT-11609/12609 Series); long hub of yoke to the rear (RT-14609 Series) ( Figure 283). Insert threaded end of yoke bar through the yoke and into the bore of the range cylinder housing, aligning the notches in the bar with yoke lockscrew holes ( inset, Figure 283).

figure.caption: Figure 282. Place Range Yoke into Position, and Insert End of Yoke Bar Through Yoke

step1.para: Install the two yoke lockscrews, tighten to 35 to 45 ft-lbs. (47 to 61 Nm) and lockwire securely ( Figure 284).
If previously removed, install the O-rings in the I.D. and O.D. of the range piston ( Figure 285).

figure.caption: Figure 284. Install O-Rings in I.D. and O.D. of Range Piston

step1.para: In cylinder housing bore, install the range piston on yoke bar, flat side to the rear ( Figure 286). Tighten the nut to 70 to 85 ft-lbs. (95 to 115 Nm) ( inset, Figure 286).

figure.caption: Figure 285. Install Range Piston on Yoke Bar and Tighten Nut

step1.para: Position the new gasket on the cover mounting surface and install the range cylinder cover on the housing, open port to the upper left ( Figure 287). Apply Loctite 242 to the bolt threads and tighten to 35 to 45 ft-lbs. (47 to 61 Nm).

figure.caption: Figure 286. Install Range Cylinder Cover on Housing
